Description: Papyrus written with black ink with legal document, parts of 3 ll. on recto, verso pasted down. Cession of 20 aruras of land at Armant by Ouaininis son of Pakhnoumis (name restored from P BM EA 10389) to Teos son of Haryothes (both parties are native of Aswan); the scribe is Neshor son of Khapokhrates. Cf. P BM EA 10389.
Curator's comments: Cf. entry for P BM EA 10372 in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (48649) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/48649)
